rocks.bastion.core

Class DefaultBastionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • rocks.bastion.core.BastionFactory
      • rocks.bastion.core.DefaultBastionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BastionListener

    public class DefaultBastionFactory
extends BastionFactory
implements BastionListener
    The default implementation of a BastionFactory which registers a basic set of model converters. Also registers an event listener to Bastion which will cause exceptions and errors thrown during a Bastion request to propagate up the frame stack.

    The set of model converters which are registered by this factory are listed below:
    • StringResponseDecoder - Binds the response to a String model by reading the content inside the HTTP response.
    • JsonResponseDecoder - Binds an HTTP response with content-type application/json to a Java-based object using Gson.

      • prepareBastion

        protected void prepareBastion(BastionBuilderImpl<?> bastion)
        Description copied from class: BastionFactory
        Configures the specified instance of the BastionBuilderImpl builder. Factory subclasses must override this method to configure the builder for use with external systems/libraries. An implementation will typically register event listeners or model converters to be used by Bastion.
        Specified by:
        prepareBastion in class BastionFactory
        Parameters:
        bastion - The builder instance to configure.
